agentData.mission: Run the smallest available preflight script (e.g., the existing `preflight_smoke.py` under `runtime/outputs/code-creation/.../preflight_smoke.py`) in the execution environment and persist a diagnostic bundle to `runtime/_build/reports/preflight.json` plus `runtime/_build/logs/preflight.log` (full stdout/stderr + exit code). This must run in <60s and should be robust to partial failure (write what it can before exiting).
